definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: "Now, who will bake the bread, " asked the little red hen.
sentences.chinese: “现在，谁愿意烤面包，”红色小公鸡问道。

sentences.english: The toast is dripping with butter .
sentences.chinese: 烤面包正往下滴着黄油。

sentences.english: The woman who bakes bread in the kitchen is said to be creative.
sentences.chinese: 在厨房烤面包的女人可以被称作是有创造性的。

sentences.english: They baked their bread with frogs in it.
sentences.chinese: 他们烤面包的盆子里有青蛙。

sentences.english: I also sometimes just enjoy eating hummus on toast or a cracker.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也喜欢吃带有鹰嘴豆泥的烤面包和饼干。

sentences.english: The wine is balanced with flavors of toast.
sentences.chinese: 此酒因烤面包的香气使风味更为均衡。

sentences.english: Englishmen often end up their breakfast with toast and marmalade .
sentences.chinese: 英国人常以烤面包加果酱结束早餐。

sentences.english: The hot toast popped up in the toaster.
sentences.chinese: 热土司砰的一声从烤面包机中跳起。

sentences.english: I'm sorry, toasters are out of stock.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，烤面包器已脱销了。

sentences.english: He spread some apple jam on the bread.
sentences.chinese: 她在烤面包片上涂了薄薄的一层山莓酱。

sentences.english: Why do you think blenders and toaster ovens are so notoriously unromantic?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你会认为搅拌机和烤面包机如此的没情调？

sentences.english: Englishmen often end up their breakfast with toast and marmalade.
sentences.chinese: 英国人常用烤面包加果酱结束早餐。

sentences.english: Bacon and fried eggs, toast and butter, coffee or tea.
sentences.chinese: 培根加煎蛋，烤面包加黄油，还有咖啡或者茶。

sentences.english: If you order a toaster, one company will send it to you.
sentences.chinese: 如果您订购一台烤面包机，一家公司将其寄送给你。

sentences.english: The player with Bread and Toaster on the table wins.
sentences.chinese: 在桌面上放有面包和烤面包机的玩家获胜。

sentences.english: Deli offers freshly-baked breads, cakes, and pies.
sentences.chinese: 熟食店提供新鲜的烤面包，蛋糕，馅饼。
